class.rdfs:comment: A subclass of OrganizationRole used to describe employee relationships.
class.rdfs:label: EmployeeRole

schema:baseSalary.rdfs:comment: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.
schema:baseSalary.rdfs:label: baseSalary

schema:salaryCurrency.rdfs:comment: The currency (coded using ISO 4217 ) used for the main salary information in this job posting or for this employee.
schema:salaryCurrency.rdfs:label: salaryCurrency
